item.title: About me
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: CyrusN is a math teacher in Hong Kong, eager to learn more in programming. A teacher has two jobs. Fill young minds with knowledge, yes. But more important, give those minds a compass so that that knowledge doesn’t go to waste. From the movie: Mr Holland’s Opus
